idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.0.1770

descript.abstract:
Fisheries Sensitivity Maps in British Waters --------------------------------------------
The layers in this file have now been superceded by layers described in the following report :
Ellis, J.R., Milligan, S., Readdy, L., South, A., Taylor, N. and Brown, M. 2010. Mapping the spawning and nursery grounds of selected fish for spatial planning. Report to the Department of Environment, Food and Rural Affairs from Cefas. Defra Contract No. MB5301
The original spawning ground maps in this layer were compiled from data collected and collated by Fisheries Research Service, Aberdeen, and CEFAS Lowestoft, and form part of a comprehensive study financed by The Scottish Office and MAFF in 1998.
Selected spawning and nursery grounds in the Irish Sea were updated in 2003 as part of the JNCC Irish Sea Pilot.
descript.purpose: To provide an indication of the location of spawning grounds of selected marine commercial fish species within British waters.
descript.supplinf:
Coull, K.A., Johnstone, R., and S.I. Rogers. 1998. Fisheries Sensitivity Maps in British Waters. Published and distributed by UKOOA Ltd, 9 Albyn Terrace, Aberdeen
Polygons clipped to ESRI 1:25,000 scale Europe coastline.
For continuity, some spawning and nursery grounds have been mapped beyond UK waters.
Now superceded by :
Ellis, J.R., Milligan, S., Readdy, L., South, A., Taylor, N. and Brown, M. 2010. Mapping the spawning and nursery grounds of selected fish for spatial planning. Report to the Department of Environment, Food and Rural Affairs from Cefas. Defra Contract No. MB5301

status.progress: REQUIRED: The state of the data set.
status.update: REQUIRED: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed.

attr.attrdef: Intensity of spawning ground use, either Higher, Lower or Undetermined. If absent then different levels of use are not differentiated for this species.
